channel.title: I need a item where you can only have 1 of it
channel.description:
I need to make a item where you can only have 1 of it, so I can't get this item for the second time unless the first item is used or dropped.
It need to say: "You already got this item".
Anyone ?? :))
~ WhiteSanta ~

item.title: I need a item where you can only have 1 of it
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

In your addItem method add something like

if(player.hasItem(itemId)) { player.sendMessage("You can not have more than one of these items"); return; }

Read full topic
item.source: I need a item where you can only have 1 of it
